page.title: 07A Schoolboy's Day - 1985
page.content: I awoke at 7.30 a.m. and got dressed and washed. By 8.29 I was in school, having had my breakfast and fed my rabbits. I arranged the chairs and did some project work, before our school day began at 9 a.m. The morning was taken up with assembly, a broadcast, play-time, maths and craft. I returned home for lunch, arriving back at school at 12.48 p.m. and after play, the afternoon session was taken up with nature, break and project work. After school I caught an escaped rabbit, playing with our German Student and cleaned out the hens before tea, after which I fed the mice and played with Steven Edmonds before scouts, which began at 7 p.m. We did badge work until I returned home at 9.30 p.m. and went to bed at 9.41 p.m.
